name: Grab-and-Go Font Lookbook
description:
Having a hard time seeing what the fonts look like in Figma? Frustrated with the insane selection with no way to know what fonts are most used? Not sure which fonts will look nice together? I am here to help!


Here is the Grab-and-Go Font Lookbook:

A well-edited selection of 8 sans serif and 8 serif fonts with recommended pairings. These fonts are optimized for screen legibility, available on Google Fonts and are ready to grab.


Included in this file:

  • Cheatsheet to instantly view top Figma fonts.
  • Selection of 16 fonts that are optimized for screens, widely available, and free to use.
  • Sample cards that clearly show the font and styles with examples in different sizes and weights.
  • A fully functional style library that can be loaded.
  • Auto-Layout buttons with multiple options for all 16 fonts
  • A fun way to see font pairings in a swipe-able prototype.


More fonts updates coming soon to the prototype. Stay tuned.
